questions.title: What role do you currently have?
questions.subtitle: This helps us understand your current context at work.

metadata.chatIntro: Let's get started with getting to know you.
metadata.chatOutro: Great! Thanks for sharing your background.

choices.title: Tech-heavy
choices.descriptionHTML: Doing <r>software engineering, <u>programming</u></r>, QA engineering, software architecture, or software design

choices.title: Tech-adjacent
choices.descriptionHTML: Doing <r>product management, quality assurance</r>, UI or UX design

choices.title: Non-tech
choices.descriptionHTML: Doing work that <r>does not involve <u>software development</u>, programming</r>, or computer technologies

questions.title: What do you feel like describes you best?
questions.subtitle: This helps us understand how you feel about work.

metadata.chatIntro: Sometimes, our emotions can be used as a great signal for things we are going through.
metadata.chatOutro: Sharing feelings isn't easy. Thank you for opening up!

choices.title: TEST 2
choices.descriptionHTML: I feel like a beginner in a new field and I'm struggling to adapt and learn skills

choices.title: TEST 3
choices.descriptionHTML: I feel overwhelmed by the vast amount of information available and I'm unsure of which resources to trust and follow
